Lord of Secrets, listen attentively! I am born from the vow of the Buddha of Immeasurable Life,
The mother of all worlds.
Holding a blue lotus in my hand, I emit light illuminating this realm,
Shaking the worlds of humans and gods.
Yakshas, rakshasas, and others are warned not to be afraid,
As I am born from the Buddha's transformation to protect the world.
Various dangers and fears, such as weapons, warfare, and famine,
And the various fears of samsara, I save sentient beings from.
In the world, I am called Tara, said to be the Buddha's child.
Excellent! One should respect and praise her, then join palms,
And she will dwell in the sky, her body's light blazing.
Then she will proclaim these one hundred and eight names,
Spoken by the Buddhas of the past, the lords of the ten grounds,
And the countless Bodhisattvas, who rejoice upon hearing them.
If someone upholds them, all their sins will be eliminated.
Increasing blessings and fame, with vast wealth and auspiciousness,
All illnesses are dispersed and eliminated, peacefully abiding in the field of merit,
Long life is indeed happiness, giving rise to compassion and liberating sentient beings.
That is called the Great Sage, endowed with virtues, speaking thus.

This is the name of sublime tranquility, spoken straightforwardly to people.
If heard, one attains happiness, abundant wealth, and self-mastery,
All illnesses are liberated, endowed with all merits,
Curing premature death, ultimately reborn in the Land of Ultimate Bliss.
All gods and others should know, listen attentively as I now speak,
You should deeply rejoice, the one hundred and eight names are
Reciting these one hundred and eight tranquil and secret names,
Able to benefit all sentient beings, a rare and secret field of merit

The poor will obtain wealth and treasures, the foolish will attain great wisdom

The defeated will regain victory, enemies will turn into good friends
